name: Space war (itch) (lightsaucegames)
description:
There may be bugs. There is currently no sound in the game.

Control of the game:

Player 1: [AD] - move [WS] - create barricade and delete [SPACE] - shoot

Player 2: [ARROW LEFT AND RIGHT] - move [ARROW UP AND DOWN] - create barricade and delete [NUMPAD 0] - shoot

Player 1 and 2 - GAMEPAD: [LEFT AND RIGHT] - move [LB and RB]-create barricade and delete [A] - shoot
